name: Heroes of Fortunia
description: Heroes of Fortunia is an online multiplayer hack ‘n slash game, in which players strive to create their own dungeons, filled with monsters & traps, while at the same time attacking other players’ dungeons in an attempt to beat them.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: A DirectX10 or higher compatible graphics card with at least 512MB of memory. DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Please note that Heroes of Fortunia is currently under active development, and such the minimum specifications may change until release.
